sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is suited to a particular purpose or person
, je pravo ali ustrezno za določen namen ali osebo.

seg.quote: They preferred to join clubs more suited to their tastes.
He considered himself ideally suited for the job.

sense.def:
Kadar sta dve osebi
well suited
, je zelo verjetno, da bo odnos med njima uspešen, ker sta si podobni in ju zanimajo podobne stvari.

cit.quote: ujemati se, biti drug za drugega
